00104  * Classes
00105  */
00106 
00132 class shim_string_sink
00133     : public stlsoft::basic_shim_string<ff_char_t>
00134 {
00135 public: // Member Types
00137     typedef shim_string_sink                        class_type;
00139     typedef stlsoft::basic_shim_string<ff_char_t>   parent_class_type;
00141     typedef parent_class_type::size_type            size_type;
00142 private:
00143 
00144 public: // Construction
00145 
00147     shim_string_sink()
00148         : parent_class_type(size_type(0))
00149 #if _STLSOFT_VER < 0x010a0000 && \
00150     !defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER)
00151         , m_len(0)
00152 #endif
00153     {}
00157     explicit shim_string_sink(size_type n)
00158         : parent_class_type(n)
00159 #if _STLSOFT_VER < 0x010a0000 && \
00160     !defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER)
00161         , m_len(0)
00162 #endif
00163     {}
00164 private:
00165     class_type& operator =(class_type const& rhs); // Not supported
00166 
00167 public: // Operations
00168 
00172     void reserve(size_type n)
00173     {
00174 #if _STLSOFT_VER < 0x010a0000 && \
00175     !defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER)
00176 
00177         parent_class_type::buffer_type& buffer = parent_class_type::get_buffer();
00178 
00179         if(buffer.resize(n + 1))
00180         {
00181             buffer[n] = '\0';
00182         }
00183 
00184 #else
00185         parent_class_type::reserve(n);
00186 #endif
00187     }
00188 
00190     class_type& append(ff_char_t const* s, size_type n)
00191     {
00192 #if _STLSOFT_VER < 0x010a0000 && \
00193     !defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER)
00194 
00195         parent_class_type::buffer_type& buffer = parent_class_type::get_buffer();
00196 
00197         if(m_len + n + 1 > buffer.size())
00198         {
00199             if(!buffer.resize(m_len + n + 1))
00200             {
00201                 buffer[0] = '\0';
00202                 m_len = 0;
00203 
00204                 return *this;
00205             }
00206         }
00207 
00208         ::memcpy(&buffer[0] + m_len, s, sizeof(ff_char_t) * n);
00209         m_len += n;
00210         buffer[m_len] = '\0';
00211 
00212 #else
00213         parent_class_type::append(s, n);
00214 #endif
00215 
00216         return *this;
00217     }
00218 
00220     class_type& append(ff_char_t const* s)
00221     {
00222 #if _STLSOFT_VER < 0x010a0000 && \
00223     !defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER)
00224 
00225         append(s, stlsoft::c_str_len(s));
00226 
00227 #else
00228         parent_class_type::append(s);
00229 #endif
00230 
00231         return *this;
00232     }
00233 
00235     void truncate(size_type n)
00236     {
00237         parent_class_type::truncate(n);
00238     }
00239 
00240 #if _STLSOFT_VER < 0x010a0000 && \
00241     !defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER)
00242 
00243 public: // Accessors
00244 
00246     size_type size() const
00247     {
00248         STLSOFT_ASSERT(m_len < const_cast<class_type*>(this)->parent_class_type::get_buffer().size());
00249 
00250         return m_len;
00251     }
00252 
00254     operator size_type() const
00255     {
00256         return size();
00257     }
00258 
00259 private:
00260     size_type   m_len;
00261 #endif
00262 };

00273 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00274 inline wchar_t const* c_str_data_w(
00275 #else /* ? FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00276 inline char const* c_str_data_a(
00277 #endif /* FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00278     shim_string_sink const& sink
00279 )
00280 {
00281     return sink.data();
00282 }
00283 
00285 inline ff_char_t const* c_str_data(
00286     shim_string_sink const& sink
00287 )
00288 {
00289     return sink.data();
00290 }
00291 
00293 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00294 inline size_t c_str_len_w(
00295 #else /* ? FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00296 inline size_t c_str_len_a(
00297 #endif /* FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00298     shim_string_sink const& sink
00299 )
00300 {
00301     return sink.size();
00302 }
00303 
00305 inline size_t c_str_len(
00306     shim_string_sink const& sink
00307 )
00308 {
00309     return size_t(sink.size());
00310 }
